name: Test Center Departure & Mirror Warm-up
objectives: Perform full mirror check before leaving the test center
Practice priority-to-the-right within residential side streets
Verbalise pedestrian scanning at crossings
notes: Start calmly, build examiner confidence with clear observation routines.

name: Residential 30-Zone Loop & Parking Strip
objectives: Reinforce speed discipline inside 30 zone with frequent priority changes
Execute mirror-signal manoeuvres before every lateral movement
Practice controlled turnaround on a narrow residential street
notes: Great location for parking manoeuvres and Wendeanlage practice.

name: City Core Priority Mix & Tram Junction
objectives: Handle multi-lane city junction with tram signals
Demonstrate lane discipline and legal bus-lane usage
Verbalise pedestrian and bicycle awareness at crossings
notes: High examiner value: observe signalling, speed, and tram priority rules.

name: Landstraße Transition & Speed Adaptation
objectives: Adapt from urban 50 km/h to Landstraße 100 km/h limits smoothly
Plan overtaking zones and maintain safe following distance
Narrate use of engine braking when approaching villages
notes: Great stretch to evaluate anticipatory driving outside city centre.

name: Autobahn On-ramp & Cruise Section
objectives: Use full acceleration lane, mirror checks, and shoulder glances
Maintain consistent cruising speed between 110-120 km/h where legal
Practice safe lane changes with German autobahn signalling cadence
notes: Ensure examiner sees decisive but lawful merging behaviour.

name: Service Area Stop & Controlled Restart
objectives: Demonstrate safe deceleration into the service area
Practice pulling away on slight incline with mirror checks
Discuss navigation back to acceleration lane
notes: Good location to combine parking on slope or emergency stop task.

name: Return via Suburban Streets & Examiner Cool-down
objectives: Reintroduce 50 km/h limit with pedestrian crossings
Finish with calm mirror checks and precise vehicle positioning
Debrief manoeuvres and reinforce safe shutdown procedure
notes: End the drive smoothly while examiner completes paperwork.
